page.title: 11Hallowe'en at Kylesku
page.content: The 31st of October is an exciting night for us at Kylesku. After tea- time the children dress up. Some are ghosts, some witches or skeletons. Even a superman can be seen in Kylesku that night. My dad collects all of us and takes us in his car round every house in Unapool and Kylesku. When we go into the houses we all sing songs and entertain the people. Usually we are given apples and oranges, sweets and nuts and sometimes money.Everything given to us is kept in one bag and divided equally at the end of our night out. Travelling from house to house is fun when there are so many of us packed into the car. Our last visit is to a house where there is a party. At 11.30 we all go home, exhausted.
